name: Create New Blog Notice
author: Todd Lahtinen

sections.description: New users often do not know where to start when it with WordPress. This plugin places a bright yellow button at the top of the dashboard to guide the user to the place to create their first blog. After the user has made a blog the button dissapears. This plugin is configured to run in WordPress network. Plugin may need modification to run on standalone install of wordpress.

short_description: This plugin adds a button to the admin panel that links to the create a new blog page. button disapears after user has created one blog.
